markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Expeditious Inspection](/Actions.aspx?ID=2815) <actions string="Free Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=818" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 104 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Frequency** once 10 minutes

</column>

---

You observe and assess your surroundings with great speed. You [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2367), [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=2301), or [Sense Motive](/Actions.aspx?ID=2302).
name: Expeditious Inspection
